item.title: Getting Started with Kali Linux: A Beginner's Guide üîí
item.description: This blog post introduces Kali Linux, a powerful Debian-based distribution designed for penetration testing and security auditing. We will cover the installation process, basic usage, setting up Kali Linux, and available resources to help you get started. üöÄ
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Understanding iframes: Embedding Content and Security Considerations üåê
item.description: In this blog post, we'll explore the world of iframes: what they are, how to use them, their applications, and security considerations. We'll also discuss a cool feature you can use with iframes! üñ•Ô∏è
